name: Post to PDF
description: A Publii plugin that adds option to download posts on the website.
author: freaks-dev

config.name: pdfIconPosition
config.label: Position of the PDF icon
config.note: Choose whether the PDF download icon should appear on the left or right side of the screen.

config.name: buttonText
config.label: Button Text
config.note: Text displayed on the PDF button.

config.name: buttonBackgroundColor
config.label: Button Background Color
config.note: Specify the background color of the button.

config.name: buttonTextColor
config.label: Button Text Color
config.note: Specify the text color of the button.

config.name: titleFontSize
config.label: Title Font Size
config.note: Set the font size for the post title in the PDF.

config.name: contentFontSize
config.label: Content Font Size
config.note: Set the font size for the post content in the PDF.

config.name: lineSpacing
config.label: Line Spacing
config.note: Set the line space for the post content in the PDF.

config.name: includeImages
config.label: Include Images
config.note: Choose whether to include images in the PDF.
